title: Tim Merlier Fastest in Crash-Riddled Finale after Poga훾ar Goes to Play in the UAE Tour Breakaway
content:
Poga훾ar continues to rip up the script by cruising more than 100km in the move and scooping intermediate seconds in pan-flat UAE Tour stage.

Read the full article at Tim Merlier Fastest in Crash-Riddled Finale after Poga훾ar Goes to Play in the UAE Tour Breakaway on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
